data.title: Village of North Aurora
data.meta_description: The Village of North Aurora is an Attentive Municipal Organization that Connects with Community, Commerce, and Nature.
data.text:
August 9 2024 Road Program This week the contractor completed the final asphalt surface on Harmony and Silver Trail. They completed the pavement removal throughout Oak Hill and Windstone subdivisions and completed the aggregate base work in the Oak Hill subdivision. They have started this work within Windstone and will complete it on Monday. â€¦ Read More about Construction Updates: August 9, 2024

We have already had some awesome events for 2024 and we have lots more planned! Check out the lineup remaining for 2024! You can view details at any time for any event at our Village Events Calendar or stay tuned for more information as each event comes closer!â€¦ Read More about 2024 Community Event Lineup

The Village of North Aurora conducted a traffic safety campaign throughout the month of July reminding motorists to slow down to save lives. The speed enforcement effort was conducted by the North Aurora Police Department and other state and local law enforcement agencies across Illinois to reduce highway fatalities. During the campaign, the Northâ€¦ Read More about North Aurora Police Department Releases July Speed Enforcement Numbers
